General.Name: Publity AG
General.Description: publity AG invests in commercial real estate properties in Germany. It offers asset management services, including services related to the purchase, management, and marketing of properties. The company also issues closed-end real estate funds. publity AG was founded in 1999 and is based in Frankfurt am Main, Germany.

0.Name: Mr. Frank  Schneider
0.Title: CEO & Chairman of the Management Board
